contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 1901 D Marsden Contest
Marsden Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
marsden-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Bank Bottom, Marsden, West Yorkshire 4th annual contest promoted by Marsden Brass Band Choice of test pieces: "Belisario", "Crispino" or "Songs of Scotland" Prizes: £7, £4, £3, £2, £1 March: 1. Cleckheaton, 2. Linthwaite 9 bands competed.
March 25, 2014, 3:15 p.m. June 20, 2018, 8:40 p.m.
1 New Mills Band Alexander Owen Belisario [arr. Round]
2 Boarshurst Silver Band Alexander Owen Songs of Scotland
3 Cleckheaton Victoria Angus Holden Crispino [arr. Round]
4 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Angus Holden Belisario [arr. Round]
5 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift Songs of Scotland
Unknown Result Copley and Skircoat Angus Holden Crispino [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Stalybridge Borough Alexander Owen Belisario [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Hinchliffe Mill Band Angus Holden Belisario [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Halifax King Cross John Gladney Jnr Belisario [arr. Round]
